title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 04 March 2012 - XWiki
content:

08:09 <npm> has quit  
09:07 <CIA-120> Sergiu Dumitriu master \* r74ce537 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-commons/commit/74ce5376bde9519e39c009ffa9e462a24ff22024 / (3 files in 3 dirs): XCOMMONS-119: Add velocity Collections tool to be able to create various types of collections ...  
09:21 <CIA-120> Sergiu Dumitriu master \* r9ceb70f https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/9ceb70f6f182358823630aa6a11c2396557299e6 / xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-oldcore/src/main/resources/ApplicationResources.properties : [misc] Remove duplicated translation keys - http://git.io/nZ\_Qeg  
09:22 <CIA-120> Sergiu Dumitriu stable-3.5.x \* rc852f1c https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/c852f1c5801914025a758071b9553c855143f65f / xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-oldcore/src/main/resources/ApplicationResources.properties : [misc] Remove duplicated translation keys ...  
09:23 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
09:28 <sdumitriu> has quit  
09:30 <npm> has joined #xwiki  
10:21 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
13:32 <mflorea> has quit  
14:15 <tekzilla> has quit  
14:16 <tekzilla> has joined #xwiki  
15:49 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
18:58 <vmassol> has quit  
20:09 <sdumitriu> has joined #xwiki  
21:42 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
21:50 <rapidx> has joined #xwiki  
21:52 <rapidx> Hello. Just did a fresh xwiki installation with sample data and tried to access the /rest through the browser. I get an Internal Server error. Any ideas why?  
21:59 <@cjd> can you paste the full error to a pastebin? also check the logs and see if there is a stack trace which was generated when you went there.  
22:04 <@sdumitriu> rapidx: What's the exact URL you tried to access?  
22:05 <rapidx> http://pastebin.com/RNLf7qeJ  
22:06 <rapidx> Well i tried this : http://<server>:8080/xwiki/rest  
22:06 <rapidx> Using tomcat7  
22:06 <rapidx> up  
22:06 <rapidx> um. one sec. wrong pastebin  
22:07 <@sdumitriu> Yes, wrong, but that one is interesting as well...  
22:07 <rapidx> Yes that would be my next question..  
22:08 <rapidx> Well there is no output on the error while trying to access rest. This is what I get http://pastebin.com/PKxstPAS  
22:10 <@sdumitriu> Ah, I think I know  
22:10 <@sdumitriu> There's been a regression, you can't access it through the browser but it will work if you access it from a service  
22:11 <vmassol> http://jira.xwiki.org/jira/browse/XWIKI-7513  
22:14 <rrodriguez> has joined #xwiki  
22:14 <rapidx> sdumitriu: ah, i see! Great, thanks a bunch  
22:15 <rapidx> vmassol: Thanks  
22:15 <@sdumitriu> The issue mentions attachment, but all the REST requests fail when not passing a certain Accept header  
22:16 <Denis> has joined #xwiki  
22:18 <@sdumitriu> rapidx: http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-7599  
22:18 <@sdumitriu> I guess that's what's happening with the first pastebin, right?  
22:19 <rapidx> sdumitriu: Exactly that yes. thanks for the bug  
22:19 <rapidx> i mean adding the issue  
22:38 <CIA-120> Sergiu Dumitriu master \* r630159c https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/630159c23cae5628037374b29616b01880600110 / xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-watchlist/xwiki-platform-watchlist-api/src/main/java/com/xpn/xwiki/plugin/watchlist/WatchListPluginApi.java : XWIKI-7599: Activity macro doesn't work when logged in as superadmin ...  
22:39 <CIA-120> Sergiu Dumitriu stable-3.5.x \* r33e9f94 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/33e9f9421c4e26887d24043609b824c2cd73f725 / xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-watchlist/xwiki-platform-watchlist-api/src/main/java/com/xpn/xwiki/plugin/watchlist/WatchListPluginApi.java : XWIKI-7599: Activity macro doesn't work when logged in as superadmin ...  
22:41 <@sdumitriu> vmassol: Yesterday there were no unstable jobs on ci.xwiki.org...  
22:41 <@sdumitriu> A rare event  
22:52 <abusenius> has joined #xwiki
